text: Ari Mustonen is a Finnish cross-country skier. He represented Finland at the 1984 Winter Paralympics held in Innsbruck, Austria. He won the bronze medal at the Men's Short Distance 5 km LW2 event. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic cross-country skiers of Finland Category:Finnish male cross-country skiers Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Finland Category:Paralympic medalists in cross-country skiing
title: Ari Mustonen
